recommendations.excerpt: A brief guide to habits that separate deep understanding from superficial knowledge — and how to cultivate them.

recommendations.title: Loved Chhaava? Here Are 16 Other Historical Dramas That Will Transport You to the Past
recommendations.excerpt: On Monday, it was reported that Chhaava, the historical drama based based on the life of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj (Vicky Kaushal), the son of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, recorded the highest first Monday of 2025 with an earning of INR 24 crores.

recommendations.title: YouTuber’s ‘Dirty’ Comments Spark Massive Row in India
recommendations.excerpt: These were the words India's Supreme Court used on Tuesday while granting interim protection from arrest to a popular YouTuber who has been in the eye of a storm in the country over the past week.

recommendations.title: Trump Says Unfair to US If Musk Builds Tesla Factory in India
recommendations.excerpt: U.S. President Donald Trump has said that if Tesla (TSLA.O), opens new tab were to build a factory in India to circumvent that country's tariffs, it would be "unfair" to the U.S., in an interview with Fox News which aired on Tuesday.

recommendations.title: Trump Scraps $21m US Funds for Voter Turnout in India: ‘They Got a Lot More Money’
recommendations.excerpt: President Donald Trump defended the US Department of Government Efficiency's (DOGE) move to scrap a $21m grant to boost voter turnout in India. Billionaire Elon Musk-led DOGE over the weekend announced a series of expenditure cuts, including the grant allocated for voter turnout in India.

recommendations.excerpt: For over forty years, Kavita Singh has brought her singular aesthetic to the homes of film stars, politicians, entrepreneurs and business barons.

recommendations.title: Pullela Gopichand Explains Why He Said Don’t Play Sport Unless You Are Rich or Poor
recommendations.excerpt: Indian badminton national coach Pullela Gopichand stirred a hornet’s nest by saying athletes should think twice before taking up sport seriously if they come from middle class families.

recommendations.title: Why Retractions Data Could Be a Powerful Tool for Cleaning up Science
recommendations.excerpt: A Nature analysis of retractions hotspots around the world suggests institutions should pay close attention to retractions data.

recommendations.title: From Pune to Delhi, Riverfront Projects Are All the Rage. but Evidence Shows They Harm Rivers
recommendations.excerpt: On a Sunday morning earlier this month, around 800 citizens of Pune gathered in the locality of Baner. The group walked along the Mula river for around 20 minutes, before settling down in a grove where it merged with the Ramnadi river.

recommendations.excerpt: Kirana stores are not dinosaurs; they are resilient and adaptable. Given the right tools—digital payments, microloans, and online storefronts—they can thrive in a tech-dominated world.

recommendations.excerpt: Existential psychology offers specific ways to find meaning, giving you a buffer against despair in these anxious times.

recommendations.title: How Wellness Tourism Is Becoming the Next Travel Trend to Follow Among Travellers
recommendations.excerpt: Wellness tourism in India is booming, driven by a growing focus on Ayurveda, yoga, and naturopathy. The country's rich history in healing sciences and new government initiatives attract both domestic and international travelers seeking holistic health solutions. Facilities see increased interest, especially among young professionals, as India aims to become a global wellness hub.

recommendations.title: What Should Retired People Do During Market Downturns?
recommendations.excerpt: What should retired people do during market downturns?With proper planning and a balanced approach, Indian retirees can maintain their lifestyle and financial security even during challenging market conditions

recommendations.title: A Universe in Ruins
recommendations.excerpt: After a few wobbly years post-‘Endgame,’ ‘Captain America: Brave New World’ was meant to put the MCU back on track. Now the Red Hulk has come and gone, and things somehow feel even more dire.

recommendations.title: Are Expecting Mothers in India at Risk of Vitamin D Deficiency During Winter?
recommendations.excerpt: Though India is a tropical country, expectant mothers still suffer from vitamin D deficiency which can be risky for the mother as well as the baby, especially in winter when the reception of sunlight is very low.

recommendations.title: Beyond the Buzz: Do Celebrity-Owned Restaurants in Mumbai Have Real Staying Power?
recommendations.excerpt: There is something about Mumbai and its obsession with celebrity culture — whether it is spotting a Bollywood star on a coffee run or queuing up for a table at a restaurant they own.

recommendations.title: India, the ‘Pharmacy of the World’ Banks on Bilateral Talks for Relief From Planned US Tariffs
recommendations.excerpt: Indian drugmakers are seeking bilateral discussions with the U.S. to avoid President Donald Trumps proposed 25% tariff on pharmaceutical imports, according to the Indian Pharmaceutical Alliance (IPA). The U.S. is India's largest market, accounting for $8.7 billion (31%) of total pharma exports in fiscal 2024.

recommendations.title: How to Be Safe in Gym, and Avoid the Risk of Fatal Injuries
recommendations.excerpt: Gym safety is once again a topic of discussion following the tragic death of national-level powerlifter Yashtika Acharya during a workout. The 17-year-old died after a 270-kg weight she was attempting to lift fell on her neck during training at a gym in Rajasthan's Bikaner.

recommendations.title: Scientists Think Visitors From Another Star System May Have Infiltrated Our Galactic Neighborhood
recommendations.excerpt: Sure, they’re particles and rocks, but they’re still a fascinatingly long way from home.

recommendations.title: What’s the Smarter Choice — to Buy a Flat or Rent One?
recommendations.excerpt: One needs to decide based on one’s long-term career plans, finances, home loan eligibility, and lifestyle choices, among other factors.

recommendations.title: Rahul Gandhi Unveils a Revolutionary’s Statue – Why Is He Keeping Focus on Independence?
recommendations.excerpt: Leader of the Opposition (LoP) in the Lok Sabha Rahul Gandhi unveiled the statue of Rana Beni Madho, a revolutionary belonging to the Awadh region, in his parliamentary constituency Rae Bareli in Uttar Pradesh on Thursday.
